sentence.Network_en: Get hold of the company list from your careers advisory service.
sentence.Network_cn: 到就业指导处领取企业名录。

sentence.Network_en: Now my role is strictly advisory.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在我的角色仅限于顾问。

sentence.Network_en: I have worked in an advisory capacity with many hospitals.
sentence.Network_cn: 我曾在多家医院做过顾问工作.

entry.def: An advisory group regularly gives suggestions and help to people or organizations, especially about a particular subject or area of activity.

example.ex: ...members of the advisory committee on the safety of nuclear installations...
example.tran: 核设施安全顾问委员会的成员

example.ex: Now my role is strictly advisory.
example.tran: 现在我的角色仅限于顾问。

entry.tran: （关于天气、疾病或其他危险、问题的）公告，警告
entry.def: An advisory is an official announcement or report that warns people about bad weather, diseases, or other dangers or problems.

sentences.sentence: "an advisory memorandum", "his function was purely consultative"

auth_sentence.content: Mr Wrightman will stay on in an advisory role.

auth_sentence.content: That goes to a diocesan advisory committee, he said.

stems_affixes.word_buile: di分开+vis分开+ible能……的→adj.可分的
advise建议+able能……的→adj.可取的, 明智的
advise[v.忠告,劝告,建议;通知,告知]+ory……的→adj.劝告的
provision预备+al……的→预备的,临时的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 看得见的, 明显的, 显著的
stems_affixes.word_buile: vis看,查+ible能……的→adj.看得见的, 明显的, 显著的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有远见的,有洞察力的;空想的
stems_affixes.word_buile: vision[n.视力,视觉;远见;洞察力;幻想,幻影;想象力]+ary……的→adj.有远见的,有洞察力的;空想的
vis看,查+ual……的→adj.看的,看得见的;视觉的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 装置, 设计, 图案, 策略, 发明物, 设备

advise[v.忠告,劝告,建议;通知,告知]→ n.忠告,建议;告知
advise建议+or人→advisor顾问

stems_affixes.value_cn: 供应,[一批]供应品;预备;条款;[
stems_affixes.word_buile: pro前,提前+vis看,查+ion表名词→供应;预备
revise[v.修订,校订;修正,修改]+ion表名词→n.修改,修订

stems_affixes.value_cn: 监考人,管理人,检查员,主管人,[计]超级用户

vis看,查+a→看过了的,查过了的→允许入境

stems_affixes.value_cn: 视力,视觉;远见;洞察力;幻想,幻影;想象力

stems_affixes.value_cn: 拜访, 访问, 游览, 参观
stems_affixes.word_buile: vis看,查+it走→边走边看→游览

stems_affixes.value_cn: 设计;发明;图谋;作出[计划];想出[办法]
stems_affixes.word_buile: de分开+vis分开+e→分离出→想出

stems_affixes.value_cn: 忠告,劝告,建议;通知,告知
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad=according+vis看,查+e→根据查看而提出
pre预先+vis看,查+e→v.预知,预先警告
re再+vis看,查+e→再看→修正
vis看,查+a→看过了的,查过了的→允许入境
visual[adj.看的,看得见的;视觉的]+ize表动词→v.想象
super在上面+vis看+e→在上面看→临视

sentences.en: She is employed by the president in an advisory capacity.
I have worked in an advisory capacity with many hospitals.
sentences.cn: 我曾在多家医院做过顾问工作。

sentences.en: He was appointed to the advisory committee last month.
sentences.cn: 他上个月获任命为顾问委员会委员。

sentences.en: The advisory group has outlived its usefulness.
sentences.cn: 顾问组已失去了它的作用。

sentences.en: We operate as an advisory service for schools.
sentences.cn: 我们为学校提供咨询服务。

sentences.en: The advisory committee did not apply for a general increase in the ceiling.
sentences.cn: 咨询委员会没有请求对最高限价作普遍的提高。
